Gravity (12A)

Release date:

8th November 2013

Running time:

91 mins

Synopsis:

Sandra Bullock and George Clooney are cast adrift in space in this intense sci-fi thriller - Amazing in 3D!

Cast:

George Clooney, Sandra Bullock

Director:

Alfonso Cuaron
